title: Happy Friendship Day: Karan Johar, Farhan Akhtar, Madhuri Dixit, others take to Twitter to wish fans
text:
Other Articles Miranda Lambert enjoys girls' night with Shania Twain post split Kourtney Kardashian stuns in sexy swimsuit post ex-beau's post Gisele Bundchen ridiculed for keeping 'boob job' secret under burqa Filmmaker Karan Johar , Farhan Akhtar, actress Madhuri Dixit Nene among others today took to Twitter to wish their fans Happy Friendship day.
Johar, who popularised the occasion with his 1998 blockbuster “Kuch Kuch Hota Hai”, wrote, “Friendship is an underrated relationship… It actually is the biggest strength to have… True friends are more than family… #FriendshipDay.”
“Happy Friendship Day! To all my fans and friends, thank you for all the love and support,” Madhuri Dixit said.
Actor-filmmaker Farhan, who directed the 2001 coming-of-age film about three best friends, “Dil Chahta Hai”, while wishing his fans, tweeted, a real friend is that mirror which does not lie while showing your true identity.
“Happy friendship day you guys, my most special friends, who have stood by me in the highs and lows, inspired me to be a better actress and person,” “ABCD 2″ star Shraddha Kapoor said.
“Happy friendship day. As I say, friends are the family we choose. Thankfully I am blessed with many. To all my friends, cheers and thank you,” actor Arshad Warsi tweeted.
Anupam Kher wrote, “Friendship is a sheltering tree. #HappyFriendshipDay to all of you.”
“Vicky Donor” star Ayushmann Khurrana, giving tribute to “Kuch Kuch Hota Hai”, said, “Pyaar Dosti hai. #FilmyFriendshipDay #KKHH.”
Actress Sushmita Sen tweeted, “Happy Friendship Day Beautiful people! Thank you for your wishes, and more so for being friends for all weathers and all heart. I love u guys…”
Actor Arjun Rampal wrote, “Happy Friendship day my Twitter friends. Woke up to so many messages. Thanked God for all my beautiful friends. Feel blessed. #friendshipday.”
“Special something for all you lovely people out there who’ve stood by me from the start! #HappyFriendshipDay,” said actress Aditi Rao Hydari.
First Published on August 02, 2015 3:59 pm
